instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Password fields must require at least one special character and be 8 chars long.
output:
Scenario: Password without special character
Given a password field
When user enters 'password123'
Then error message displays 'Must contain special character'

Scenario: Password too short
Given a password field
When user enters 'pass!'
Then error message displays 'Must be 8+ characters'

Scenario: Valid password accepted
Given a password field
When user enters 'Password123!'
Then password is accepted

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must prevent users from checking out if the inventory count is less than the requested quantity.
output:
Scenario: Checkout allowed with sufficient stock
Given product A has stock of 5 units
When user adds 2 of product A to cart
Then checkout is allowed

Scenario: Checkout blocked with insufficient stock
Given product A has stock of 5 units
When user adds 6 of product A to cart
Then checkout is blocked with error 'Insufficient Stock'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The API endpoint /api/v1/users should return 401 Unauthorized if the Bearer token is missing.
output:
Scenario: Valid authorization token
Given the /api/v1/users endpoint
When a request is made with Authorization header 'Bearer valid_token'
Then response status is 200 OK

Scenario: Missing authorization token
Given the /api/v1/users endpoint
When a request is made without Authorization header
Then response status is 401 Unauthorized

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must be logged out automatically after 30 minutes of inactivity.
output:
Scenario: Session remains active with activity
Given a user is logged in
When user performs an action within 30 minutes
Then session remains active

Scenario: Session expires after inactivity
Given a user is logged in
When no activity occurs for 30 minutes
Then user is automatically logged out
And redirect to login page occurs

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Email addresses must be validated to ensure they contain an @ symbol and a valid domain.
output:
Scenario: Valid email accepted
Given an email input field
When user enters 'user@example.com'
Then email is accepted

Scenario: Email without @ symbol rejected
Given an email input field
When user enters 'userexample.com'
Then error message displays 'Invalid email format'

Scenario: Email without domain rejected
Given an email input field
When user enters 'user@'
Then error message displays 'Invalid email format'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The search feature must return results within 2 seconds for queries with up to 1000 matching records.
output:
Scenario: Search returns within time limit
Given a database with 1000 matching records
When user performs a search query
Then results are returned within 2 seconds

Scenario: Search performance with maximum records
Given a database with exactly 1000 matching records
When user performs a search query
Then response time is measured at under 2000ms

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users can only delete their own comments, not comments made by other users.
output:
Scenario: User deletes own comment
Given user A has posted a comment
When user A clicks delete on their comment
Then the comment is removed

Scenario: User cannot delete another user's comment
Given user B has posted a comment
When user A attempts to delete user B's comment
Then delete action is denied with error 'Unauthorized'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Credit card numbers must be masked in the UI, showing only the last 4 digits.
output:
Scenario: Credit card is masked on display
Given a saved credit card with number 4111111111111234
When the payment methods page is displayed
Then card number shows as '************1234'

Scenario: Full card number never exposed in UI
Given a user views their payment information
When inspecting the page source
Then full card number is not present in HTML

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must support pagination with 20 items per page by default.
output:
Scenario: Default pagination shows 20 items
Given a list with 50 items
When user views the first page
Then 20 items are displayed

Scenario: Pagination navigation works correctly
Given a list with 50 items on page 1
When user clicks 'Next' button
Then items 21-40 are displayed on page 2

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: File uploads must be limited to 10MB maximum size.
output:
Scenario: File under size limit uploads successfully
Given a file upload form
When user uploads a 5MB file
Then file is uploaded successfully

Scenario: File over size limit is rejected
Given a file upload form
When user uploads a 15MB file
Then error message displays 'File exceeds 10MB limit'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Two-factor authentication must be required for all admin account logins.
output:
Scenario: Admin login requires 2FA
Given an admin user enters valid credentials
When login is submitted
Then 2FA verification screen is displayed

Scenario: Admin login fails without 2FA code
Given an admin user is on 2FA screen
When incorrect 2FA code is entered
Then login is denied with error 'Invalid verification code'

Scenario: Regular user login skips 2FA
Given a regular user enters valid credentials
When login is submitted
Then user is logged in directly without 2FA

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The shopping cart must persist across browser sessions for logged-in users.
output:
Scenario: Cart persists after logout and login
Given user adds 3 items to cart
When user logs out and logs back in
Then cart still contains 3 items

Scenario: Cart is restored on new browser session
Given user has items in cart and closes browser
When user opens new browser and logs in
Then previous cart items are restored

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: API rate limiting must restrict clients to 100 requests per minute.
output:
Scenario: Requests within rate limit succeed
Given a client has made 50 requests in current minute
When client makes another request
Then response status is 200 OK

Scenario: Requests exceeding rate limit are blocked
Given a client has made 100 requests in current minute
When client makes request 101
Then response status is 429 Too Many Requests

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Phone numbers must be validated to accept only digits and common formatting characters.
output:
Scenario: Valid phone number accepted
Given a phone number input field
When user enters '+1 (555) 123-4567'
Then phone number is accepted

Scenario: Phone with letters rejected
Given a phone number input field
When user enters '555-CALL-NOW'
Then error message displays 'Invalid phone number format'

Scenario: Phone number too short rejected
Given a phone number input field
When user enters '123'
Then error message displays 'Phone number too short'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must confirm their email address before accessing premium features.
output:
Scenario: Unverified user blocked from premium
Given a user has not verified their email
When user attempts to access premium feature
Then access is denied with message 'Please verify your email'

Scenario: Verified user can access premium
Given a user has verified their email
When user attempts to access premium feature
Then access is granted

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must log all failed login attempts with IP address and timestamp.
output:
Scenario: Failed login is logged
Given a user enters incorrect password
When login attempt fails
Then security log contains entry with IP and timestamp

Scenario: Multiple failed attempts are tracked
Given a user fails login 3 times
When viewing security logs
Then 3 separate entries exist with correct timestamps

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Product prices must be displayed with the user's local currency based on their region settings.
output:
Scenario: US user sees USD prices
Given a user with region set to United States
When viewing product catalog
Then prices display with $ symbol in USD

Scenario: EU user sees EUR prices
Given a user with region set to Germany
When viewing product catalog
Then prices display with â‚¬ symbol in EUR

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The forgot password flow must expire reset tokens after 1 hour.
output:
Scenario: Valid reset token within time limit
Given a password reset token generated 30 minutes ago
When user clicks the reset link
Then password reset form is displayed

Scenario: Expired reset token rejected
Given a password reset token generated 2 hours ago
When user clicks the reset link
Then error message displays 'Reset link has expired'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must be able to export their data in CSV format.
output:
Scenario: CSV export downloads successfully
Given a user with 100 records
When user clicks 'Export to CSV'
Then a CSV file downloads with all 100 records

Scenario: CSV format is valid
Given a downloaded CSV export
When file is opened in spreadsheet application
Then data is correctly formatted in columns

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The application must display a maintenance page during scheduled downtime.
output:
Scenario: Maintenance page shown during downtime
Given the system is in maintenance mode
When user attempts to access any page
Then maintenance page is displayed

Scenario: Normal access restored after maintenance
Given maintenance mode has ended
When user accesses the application
Then normal pages are displayed

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Duplicate account registrations with the same email must be prevented.
output:
Scenario: New email registration succeeds
Given email 'new@example.com' is not registered
When user submits registration form
Then account is created successfully

Scenario: Duplicate email registration blocked
Given email 'existing@example.com' is already registered
When user submits registration with same email
Then error displays 'Email already registered'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The API must return proper error codes with descriptive messages in JSON format.
output:
Scenario: 404 error returns JSON
Given a request to non-existent resource
When API responds with 404
Then response body contains JSON with 'error' and 'message' fields

Scenario: 400 error includes validation details
Given a request with invalid parameters
When API responds with 400
Then response body contains JSON with specific validation errors

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must be able to sort product listings by price, name, or date added.
output:
Scenario: Sort by price ascending
Given a product listing page
When user selects 'Price: Low to High'
Then products are ordered from lowest to highest price

Scenario: Sort by name alphabetically
Given a product listing page
When user selects 'Name: A-Z'
Then products are ordered alphabetically

Scenario: Sort by newest first
Given a product listing page
When user selects 'Date: Newest'
Then most recently added products appear first

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must prevent SQL injection attacks by sanitizing all user inputs.
output:
Scenario: SQL injection attempt is blocked
Given a search input field
When user enters "'; DROP TABLE users; --"
Then input is sanitized and no database damage occurs

Scenario: Legitimate queries work normally
Given a search input field
When user enters "John's Hardware Store"
Then search returns expected results without errors

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Bulk delete operations must require confirmation before execution.
output:
Scenario: Bulk delete shows confirmation dialog
Given user selects 10 items for deletion
When user clicks 'Delete Selected'
Then confirmation dialog appears with item count

Scenario: Bulk delete cancelled on decline
Given confirmation dialog is displayed
When user clicks 'Cancel'
Then no items are deleted and list remains unchanged

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The image gallery must support lazy loading for better performance.
output:
Scenario: Images below fold are not loaded initially
Given a gallery page with 50 images
When page first loads
Then only visible images are loaded

Scenario: Images load when scrolled into view
Given a gallery with lazy loading enabled
When user scrolls down
Then additional images load as they enter viewport

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Date fields must accept input in multiple formats including MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY-MM-DD.
output:
Scenario: US date format accepted
Given a date input field
When user enters '12/25/2024'
Then date is accepted and parsed correctly

Scenario: ISO date format accepted
Given a date input field
When user enters '2024-12-25'
Then date is accepted and parsed correctly

Scenario: Invalid date format rejected
Given a date input field
When user enters '25-12-2024'
Then error message displays 'Invalid date format'

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Webhook endpoints must respond within 5 seconds or the request will timeout.
output:
Scenario: Fast webhook response succeeds
Given a webhook endpoint that responds in 2 seconds
When webhook is triggered
Then response is received and processed

Scenario: Slow webhook times out
Given a webhook endpoint that takes 10 seconds
When webhook is triggered
Then request times out after 5 seconds
And timeout error is logged

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Users must be able to change their account password from the settings page.
output:
Scenario: Password change successful
Given user is on settings page
When user enters current password and new valid password
Then password is updated successfully

Scenario: Password change requires current password
Given user is on settings page
When user enters wrong current password
Then error displays 'Current password is incorrect'

Scenario: New password must meet requirements
Given user enters valid current password
When new password is 'weak'
Then error displays password requirements

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The notification system must allow users to opt out of marketing emails.
output:
Scenario: User opts out of marketing emails
Given user is on notification preferences
When user disables 'Marketing emails' toggle
Then preference is saved and no marketing emails are sent

Scenario: Transactional emails still sent after opt-out
Given user has opted out of marketing emails
When user makes a purchase
Then order confirmation email is still sent

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must compress images uploaded by users to reduce storage costs.
output:
Scenario: Large image is compressed
Given a user uploads a 5MB image
When upload completes
Then stored image size is reduced while maintaining quality

Scenario: Image dimensions are preserved
Given a user uploads a 1920x1080 image
When compression is applied
Then image dimensions remain 1920x1080

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The dashboard must refresh data every 30 seconds without requiring page reload.
output:
Scenario: Dashboard auto-refreshes
Given user is viewing the dashboard
When 30 seconds have elapsed
Then data is updated without page reload

Scenario: Manual refresh available
Given user is viewing the dashboard
When user clicks refresh button
Then data updates immediately

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must support undo for delete operations within 10 seconds.
output:
Scenario: Undo available after delete
Given user deletes an item
When delete confirmation appears
Then 'Undo' button is displayed for 10 seconds

Scenario: Undo restores deleted item
Given user clicks 'Undo' within 10 seconds
When undo is processed
Then item is restored to original location

Scenario: Undo expires after 10 seconds
Given user deleted an item 15 seconds ago
When user looks for undo option
Then undo is no longer available

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Multi-language support must include English, Spanish, and French.
output:
Scenario: English language displays correctly
Given user selects English language
When viewing the application
Then all UI text displays in English

Scenario: Spanish language displays correctly
Given user selects Spanish language
When viewing the application
Then all UI text displays in Spanish

Scenario: Language preference persists
Given user selects French language
When user logs out and logs back in
Then French language setting is preserved

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The checkout process must validate shipping addresses against a postal database.
output:
Scenario: Valid address passes validation
Given a valid shipping address
When user submits checkout form
Then address is validated and accepted

Scenario: Invalid address shows suggestions
Given an incomplete or invalid address
When user submits checkout form
Then suggested corrections are displayed

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Reports must be exportable in PDF format with proper formatting.
output:
Scenario: PDF export generates successfully
Given a report with charts and tables
When user clicks 'Export to PDF'
Then PDF file downloads with all content

Scenario: PDF maintains formatting
Given an exported PDF report
When opened in PDF reader
Then charts, tables, and text are properly formatted

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The system must support batch operations for updating multiple records at once.
output:
Scenario: Batch update succeeds
Given user selects 25 records
When user applies status change to all
Then all 25 records are updated

Scenario: Batch update shows progress
Given a batch operation on 100 records
When operation is in progress
Then progress indicator shows completion percentage

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: User profile photos must be cropped to a square aspect ratio.
output:
Scenario: Rectangular image is cropped
Given user uploads a 1920x1080 photo
When upload is processed
Then photo is cropped to square dimensions

Scenario: User can adjust crop area
Given user is uploading a profile photo
When crop preview is displayed
Then user can drag to select crop area

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: The API must support CORS for whitelisted domains only.
output:
Scenario: Whitelisted domain allowed
Given a request from whitelisted domain
When API receives the request
Then CORS headers allow the request

Scenario: Non-whitelisted domain blocked
Given a request from unknown domain
When API receives the request
Then CORS error is returned

instruction: Generate QA test cases for the following requirement: Audit logs must record all changes to user roles and permissions.
output:
Scenario: Role change is logged
Given an admin changes a user's role
When role update is saved
Then audit log records change with admin ID and timestamp

Scenario: Permission change is logged
Given an admin grants new permission to user
When permission is saved
Then audit log records old and new permission values
